interface.name: pl_gem1_rgmii
interface.description: Primary interface to communicate with ethernet phy in RGMII mode.

interface.name: pl_gem1_rgmii_mdio_mdc
interface.description: Secondary interface to communicate with ethernet phy when mode is selected as RGMII.

interface.name: pl_gem2_rgmii_rx
interface.description: Primary interface to communicate with ethernet phy in RGMII mode.

interface.name: pl_gem2_rgmii_tx
interface.description: Primary interface to communicate with ethernet phy in RGMII mode.

interface.name: pl_gem2_rgmii_mdio_mdc
interface.description: Secondary interface to communicate with ethernet phy when mode is selected as SGMII.
